fullname: Prophet Muḥammad, peace and blessings be upon him

info: Wife of the Prophet ﷺand daughter of Abi Bakr, the first caliph
Sister of ʿAʾishah bint Abi Bakr, daughter of Abi Bakr (the first caliph), wife of al-Zubayr ibn al-ʾAwwām, and sister-in-law of the Prophet ﷺ
Son of Asmāʿ bint Abi Bakr and therefore nephew of ʿĀʾishah bint Abi Bakr

fullname: Fāṭimah bint al-Munthir ibn al-Zubayr ibn al-ʿAwwām
searchname: Fatimah bint al-Munthir ibn al-Zubayr ibn al-Awwam
info: Wife of Hishām ibn ʿUrwah ibn al-Zubayr and granddaughter of Asmāʿ bint Abi Bakr

fullname: Abu Salamah ibn ʿAbdur-Raḥmān ibn ʿAwf
searchname: Abu Salamah ibn Abdur-Rahman ibn Awf

fullname: Hishām ibn ʿUrwah ibn az-Zubayr ibn al-ʿAwwām
searchname: Hisham ibn Urwah ibn az-Zubayr ibn al-Awwam
info: Husband of Fātimah bint al-Munthir, son of ʿUrwah ibn al-Zubayr, and grandson of Asmāʿ bint Abi Bakr
8th century author of the famous Sīrat Rasūlullah, a biography of the Prophet Muḥammad ﷺ
notes: this is THE Ibn Ishaq! https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ibn_Ishaq, https://www.britannica.com/biography/Muhammad

fullname: ʿAbbād ibn ʿAbdullāh ibn al-Zubayr ibn al-ʿAwwām
searchname: Abbad ibn Abdullah ibn al-Zubayr ibn al-Awwam
info: Grandson of Asmāʾ bint Abi Bakr and al-Zubayr ibn al-ʿAwwām

fullname: Yaḥyā ibn ʿAbbād ibn ʿAbdullāh ibn al-Zubayr ibn al-ʿAwwām
searchname: Yahya ibn Abbad ibn Abdullah ibn al-Zubayr ibn al-Awwam
info: Son of ʿAbbād ibn ʿAbdullāh and therefore great-grandson of Asmāʾ bint Abi Bakr and al-Zubayr ibn al-ʿAwwām
Founder of one of the four legal schools of thought in Sunni Islam

fullname: ʿAbdullāh ibn Idrīs ibn Yazīd al-Awdi
searchname: Abdullah ibn Idris ibn Yazid al-Awdi

info: Founder of one of the four legal schools of thought in Sunni Islam

fullname: Muḥammad ibn ʿAbdul-ʿAzīz ibn Abi Razmah
searchname: Muhammad ibn Abdul-Aziz ibn Abi Razmah
